channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Config File Provider Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Config File Provider Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003014|2024-08-05T03:00:19.351Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20config%20file%20provider%20plugin
item.description: An cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Jenkins Config File Provider Plugin 3.4.1 and earlier in src/main/resources/lib/configfiles/configfiles.jelly that allows attackers with permission to define shared configuration files to execute arbitrary JavaScript when a user attempts to delete the shared configuration file.
